lead_paragraph: To the Editor: In suggesting the composition of foreign peacekeeping troops in Kabul to provide stability to the evolving interim government in Afghanistan, you advise in a Nov. 21 editorial that ''Islamic nations like Jordan, Turkey, Bangladesh and Indonesia'' should ''especially'' be recruited by the United Nations to contribute troops.
abstract: choosing peacekeepers**Piret Pande letter on Nov 21 editorial holds United Nations should not cater to any religion or political grouping in makeup of peacekeeping force in Kabul
